mapper.insert: INSERT INTO TBL_STUDENT (SID, SPWD, SPWDQ, SPWDA, SLASTNAME, SFIRSTNAME, SEMAIL, SBIRTH, SPHONE, SZIPCODE, SADDRESS, SADDRESSDETAIL) VALUES(#{sid}, #{spwd}, #{spwdq}, #{spwda}, #{slastname}, #{sfirstname}, #{semail}, #{sbirth}, #{sphone}, #{szipcode}, #{saddress}, #{saddressdetail})
mapper.select: SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STUDENT WHERE SID = #{sid}
SELECT COUNT(*) FROM TBL_STUDENT WHERE SID = #{sid} AND SPWD = #{spwd}
